remarks: All subgroups in an abelian group commute.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
statement:
ablcntzd.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
ablcntzd.a $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ablcntzd.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
ablcntzd.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
ablcntzd $p |- ( ph -> T C_ ( Z ` U ) ) $.
